mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( writer, contents, campus, liked_usr, hatred_usr, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{writer}, #{contents}, #{campus}, ', ', ', ', now() )
INSERT INTO board ( writer, contents, campus, liked_usr, hatred_usr, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{writer}, #{contents}, '0', ', ', ', ', now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE ((campus=#{campus} AND hatred < #{hatred})OR (campus='0' AND hatred < 10) ) ORDER BY bno desc, reg_dt desc;
SELECT * FROM board WHERE (campus = '0') ORDER BY bno desc, reg_dt desc;
SELECT * FROM board WHERE ((campus=#{campus} AND hatred < #{hatred})OR (campus='0' AND hatred < 10) ) ORDER BY (liked*50 + 1) / (CAST((now() - reg_dt) AS signed integer)/1000000) desc, bno desc;
SELECT * FROM board WHERE (campus = '0') ORDER BY (liked*50 + 1) / (CAST((now() - reg_dt) AS signed integer)/1000000) desc, bno desc;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE(bno=#{bno} AND writer=#{writer})
